definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: Stopping an animation also Rewinds it to the Start.
sentences.chinese: 停止一个动画会让动画重回开始位置。

sentences.english: After a five-year hiatus, the Billboard Music Awards officially returned in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 经过5年的停办，美国公告牌音乐奖重回荧屏。

sentences.english: I must go down to the seas again, to the vagrant Gypsy life.
sentences.chinese: 我必须重回大海的怀抱，回到浪迹天涯的无拘生活。

sentences.english: This is the first day of this semester and welcome to reback to school.
sentences.chinese: 今天是开学的第一天，欢迎大家重回学校。

sentences.english: At a party in Paris after Violetta's return.
sentences.chinese: 薇奥蕾塔重回巴黎后的一个派对。

sentences.english: Ere such a soul regains its peaceful state.
sentences.chinese: 昨前如此灵魂重回清静守一之境。

sentences.english: Barcelona captain Carles Puyol returns to the squad after injury.
sentences.chinese: 巴塞罗那队长卡莱斯普约尔伤愈后重回阵容。

sentences.english: If the US is not ready to sit at a negotiating table with the [North], it will go its own way.
sentences.chinese: 如果美国尚未准备重回和谈，朝鲜将自行其事。

sentences.english: The captain returned to his club determined to lead them back to European glory.
sentences.chinese: 队长回到俱乐部，励志要率队重回欧洲之巅。

sentences.english: Is Michael back to prison at some point during the first episodes?
sentences.chinese: 在第一集的某一刻Michael会重回监狱？

sentences.english: In 1999, Macao was reintegrated into China as an autonomous region with special status.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，澳门作为特别行政区重回中国管辖。

sentences.english: If you now have a chance to return to the Warring States era, you will do?
sentences.chinese: 如果你现在有一个机会重回战国时代，你会做什么呢？

sentences.english: Handsome flying back to Shanghai, can be said to be met with the help of others.
sentences.chinese: 帅飘重回上海，可以说是遇到了贵人相助。

sentences.english: Now I'm more serene, our daily life has re-started.
sentences.chinese: 现在我已经恢复平静了，我们的生活重回正轨。

sentences.english: It has only to return to the glory of his arm.
sentences.chinese: 才有了那重回手臂的光荣。

sentences.english: Ahnert wants to persuade farmers to return to chocolate farming and preserve the forest.
sentences.chinese: 达里奥想要说服农民重回巧克力产业并保护雨林。

definition: to pick up (a theme etc)/to regain (confidence)/to revive (a custom, friendship etc)
separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
(haven't done sth) for a long time/a long time since we last met
